Por Capital

  • {{ country.capital}} -- {{ country.population}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CountriesService } from '../../services/countries.service'; import { Country } from '../../interfaces/country'; @Component({ selector: 'app-by-capitale-page', templateUrl: './by-capitale-page.component.html', styles: [ ] }) export class ByCapitalePageComponent { public countries: Country[] = []; constructor( private countriesService: CountriesService ){} searchByCapital( term:string ): void{ this.countriesService.searchCapital( term ).subscribe( countries => {this.countries = countries}) } }
